description:
Nicholas was very excited about having a chance to jump into the ocean! He had never done that before, so it was a given that I was going to make him take a dive in. He was on the swim team in school so he had no hesitation about splashing in head first into the waves.
There is an underlying confidence with Nicholas, and he is very outgoing, even though his biggest fear involves being embarrassed in public. That surprised me considering he works as a server where you have to deal with a lot of people. Oh, and he was about to take all his clothes off! But then again, he has nothing to be embarrassed about when it comes to running around naked.
He's got very dark hair that make his green eyes really stand out. To top it off his smile is enough to make anyone do what he asks — it's both devilish and innocent at the same time (and he knows it). He's also got nice, hairy legs, a big dick, and six pack abs.
His favorite part of his body wasn't what I expected.
"So what's your favorite part of your body?" I asked.
"Probably my face... it gets me into trouble. It gets me out of trouble." He smiled.
title: Nicholas
